author: _shemnon
content:
for eth_config, there has been a request to not use BN256 and instead use BN254, the reason being there is nothing 256 bit in BN254, but there are 254 bit things. The original EIPs called it alt_bn128, but he 128 was for how much security it provided and that number also appears to be wrong.

Impact is in 3 precompile lines. I can easily update besu's eth_config, any comments or concerns?  https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10029#issuecomment-3085427144
